original_text: for they could not keep it at that time because the priests had not consecrated themselves in sufficient number, nor had the people assembled in Jerusalem—
korean_text: 이는 성결하게 한 제사장들이 부족하고 백성도 예루살렘에 모이지 못하였으므로 그 정한 때에 지킬수 없었음이라

sentences.original_text: for they could not keep it at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 그때 그것을 지킬 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: because the priests had not consecrated themselves in sufficient number
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들이 충분한 수만큼 성결하게 되지 않았기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: nor had the people assembled in Jerusalem
